programme.title: Nekā Personīga
programme.desc: Raidījums “Nekā personīga” ik svētdienu saviem skatītājiem piedāvā nedēļas notikumu un procesu skaidrojumu un atklāj norises, kas būs svarīgas arī turpmāk. Raidījuma komanda ir par godīgu un atbildīgu politiku, kas Latviju padarītu par plaukstošu iespēju zemi.

programme.title: Koru kari
programme.desc: “Koru kari” ir skatītāju iemīļotais muzikālais šovs, kas iepriecinās gan mūzikas cienītājus, gan emociju pilnos līdzjutējus! Šajā aizraujošajā cīņā piedalās 10 pilsētu kori, kuri sacenšas par prestižo titulu – Latvijas skanīgākā un talantīgākā kora godu. Katrs koris, ko vada pieredzējis mentors, pārstāv savu pilsētu un cīnās ne tikai par žūrijas locekļu vērtējumu, bet arī par skatītāju atbalstu. Šovs tiek veidots pēc www.banijayrights.com formāta.

programme.title: Rēgs bruņās
programme.desc: Majore, kas apvieno sevī kiborgu un cilvēku, vada elitāru īpašo uzdevumu vienību, kas atrodas kompānijas "Hanka Robotics" pakļautībā. Tās uzdevums ir apturēt bīstamākos noziedzniekus un teroristus, taču ir kāds ienaidnieks, kura vienīgais mērķis ir iznīcināt "Hanka Robotics" kibertehnoloģiju sasniegumus…

programme.title: Ēdienkarte
programme.desc: Jauns pāris dodas uz nomaļu salu, lai apmeklētu izsmalcinātu restorānu, kurā tās šefpavārs ir sagatavojis mākslas darba cienīgu maltīti un atbilstošu pasniegšanu. Taču, lai mākslas darbs būtu neizmirstams, ir vajadzīgi arī kādi šokējoši pārsteigumi.

programme.title: Ugunsgrēks 6
programme.desc: Kad beidzās iepriekšējā sezona, Elizabete cerēja, ka tēvs apturēs viņas kāzas ar Denisu. Ziemelis nebija pārliecināts, vai Elizabetes laulības nav tikai blefs. Mērijas paziņojums pārliecināja Ziemeli, ka Elizabete kāzas uztver nopietni. Leons meloja Ziemelim, ka viņam nav izdevies Elizabeti atturēt no pārsteidzīgā soļa. Ziemelis steidzās uz cietumu, lai apturētu kāzas. Mācītājs uzsāka laulību ceremoniju, un Elizabetei bija jādod laulību zvērests. Bet ar ko tas beidzās? Tagad noskaidrosim, ar ko spraigie notikumi turpināsies seriāla jaunajā sezonā!

programme.title: Brīnumbērns
programme.desc: Torija un Kails ir precējušies un dzīvo fermā, sapņodami, ka kādu dienu kļūs par vecākiem. Sapnis nekādi nepiepildās, līdz kādu nakti notiek kas negaidīts – tuvējā mežā nokrīt citplanētiešu kuģis. Ziņkāres dzīti, abi dodas izpētīt kuģi un atrod šķietami perfektu mazuli. Pāris uzņemas mazo audzināt ar lielu mīlestību un gādību. Tomēr tīņu vecumā bērns sāk apjaust savas īpašās spējas, taču nebūt nekļūst par cilvēces glābēju, bet gan izrādās ļaunuma iemiesojums.

programme.title: Gāzi grīdā! Top 41. TOP GEARS TOP 41 16:9 HD: Ep 103
programme.desc: Raidījuma Gāzi grīdā cienītājiem – astoņos raidījumos apkopotas pēdējās desmitgades spilgtākās, interesantākās un neaizmirstamākās epizodes. Džeremijs iepazīs pasaulē mazāko auto Peel 50, kopā ar Ričardu un Džeimsu viegli slīdēs ar veco Ford Fiesta autiņu pa iepirkšanās centru, cenšoties manevrēt starp produktu plauktiem, iepazīstinās ar prestižo auto Lotus Exige, dosies braucienā cauri Rumānijai un mēģinās uzbraukt aktīvā vulkānā.

programme.title: Gāzi grīdā! Top 41. TOP GEARS TOP 41 16:9 HD: Ep 104
programme.desc: Raidījuma Gāzi grīdā cienītājiem – astoņos raidījumos apkopotas pēdējās desmitgades spilgtākās, interesantākās un neaizmirstamākās epizodes. programme.title: Mana trakā ģimene 18
programme.desc: Pavisam “parasto” Grifinu ģimeni no izdomātās Rodailendas pilsētiņas droši var raksturot kā neaudzinātu, izlutinātu un absolūti nekorektu. Pītera un Luisas Grifinu jaunākais bērns ir inteliģents, sadistisks mazulis, kurš pastāvīgi meklē savu māti un kaļ plānus par pasaules pārņemšanu. Dēlam Krisam ir tikpat zems intelekta līmenis kā viņa tēvam, meita Mega veltīgi cenšas sadraudzēties ar “foršajiem cilvēkiem”, taču vienmēr tiek atstumta. Tikmēr runājošais un martīni malkojošais ģimenes suns Braiens ir vienīgais, kam ir kaut kripatiņa saprāta.

programme.title: Mītu grāvēji: lūk, tava problēma!
programme.desc: Trieciendrošās brilles uz acīm, ugunsdzēšamais aparāts gatavībā – laiks eksperimentiem mītu grāvēju stilā! Pieredzes bagātie specefektu meistari Ādams Sevidžs un Džeimijs Hainemans desmit gadu garumā testējuši, vai Holivudas radītie mīti un urbānās leģendas iet roku rokā ar fizikas likumiem. Īpaši jaudīgākie, iespaidīgākie un pārsteidzošākie eksperimenti no Mītu grāvēju kolekcijas nu apkopoti unikālās un jautrās tematiskajās sērijās. Šajā triecienu, sprādzienu un blīkšķu enciklopēdijā atradīsies gan tādas tēmas kā ūdens, gāze, gravitācija, gan enerģija un spiediens.

programme.desc: Raidījuma Gāzi grīdā cienītājiem – astoņos raidījumos apkopotas pēdējās desmitgades spilgtākās, interesantākās un neaizmirstamākās epizodes. programme.title: Simpsoni 34
programme.desc: Vairāk nekā simts nomināciju un tikpat daudz balvu, zvaigzne Holivudas slavas alejā, episkas varoņu frāzes, kas iekļuvušas vārdnīcu lappusēs, pirmais “Playboy” animācijas tēla vāks vēsturē, nepārtrauktas pārraides vairāk nekā 30 gadu garumā, sveiciens no Vatikāna gadadienā un miljoniem fanu visā pasaulē! Šis ir animācijas seriāls “Simpsoni” un tā dzeltenie varoņi – Homērs, Mārdža, Bārts, Liza un mazā Megija!

programme.title: Lielceļš cauri ellei 6
programme.desc: Cilvēks pret dabas spēku – drosmīgi vīri dara visu, lai, spītējot sniegputeņiem vai lietusgāzēm, izglābtu avarējušus auto un to pasažierus uz Kanādas bīstamajiem lielceļiem. Kravas vērtība un nepieciešamība pēc iespējas ātrāk to piegādāt liks glābēju brigādei pielikt visus spēkus, prasmes un enerģiju, lai atbrīvotu ceļu. Cik smagu avāriju sekas nāksies nokopt glābšanas komandai?

programme.title: Neticamā planēta Zeme
programme.desc: Tici vai ne, bet uz mūsu planētas ir daudz ļoti neparastu dabas parādību! Kā rodas luminiscējoši, elektriski zili viļņi, kas skalojas krastā? Kādēļ zemes virsmu klāj noslēpumaini apļi, kas sniedzas, cik tālu vien acs spēj saskatīt? Dažām no šīm brīnumainajām parādībām var rast izskaidrojumu, bet citas pārsteidz pat vispieredzējušākos zinātniekus. Dodies ceļojumā pa plašo planētu, lai atklātu, cik dīvaina un neizdibināma ir mūsu pasaule!

programme.title: Neticamā planēta Zeme

programme.title: Džeimss Mejs: mūsējais Itālijā
programme.desc: Britu žurnālists Džeimss Mejs, viens no kādreizējā auto raidījuma “Gāzi grīdā!” vadītājiem, dodas aizraujošā ceļojumā uz Itāliju – vienu no savām mīļākajām valstīm. Ainaviskajā ceļojumā pāri Itālijai, Džeimss iepazīs tās vēsturi, ainavas, tradīcijas, kultūru, ēdienu un pat sportu. Bet vai lēnīgais pusmūža britu džentlmenis spēs atklāt itin visus “la dolce vita” noslēpumus?

programme.title: Džeimss Mejs: mūsējais Itālijā
programme.desc: Britu žurnālists Džeimss Mejs, viens no kādreizējā auto raidījuma “Gāzi grīdā!” vadītājiem, dodas aizraujošā ceļojumā uz Itāliju – vienu no savām mīļākajām valstīm. programme.title: Zebra. Zebra Yr 9 (2025) Ep. 909
programme.desc: Raidījuma vadmotīvs ir nemainīgs – drošība un ātrums! Tēmu loks tāpat – satiksmes drošība, satiksmes organizācija un iespējamie risinājumi. Transportlīdzekļu vadītājiem un gājējiem saistošu likumu un noteikumu izmaiņas, Eiropas valstu pieredze satiksmes problēmu risināšanā. Sava daļa stāstu būs atvēlēta sportiem, kas saistīti ar ātrumu. Raidījums visiem, kas ceļā! Raidījuma vadītājs – Pauls Timrots.

programme.title: Sieviešu cīņas klubs
programme.desc: Rebeka Holta ar segvārdu “Beksa Bestija” pēc pieciem gadiem atgriežas dzimtajā pilsētā, lai palīdzētu grūtībās nonākušajai māsai Keitai, kura ir parādā vietējam pretlikumīgo brīvo cīņu organizatoram un maniakam Lendonam Džonsam. Bekas vienīgā iespēja nopelnīt naudu parāda atmaksai ir piedalīties un uzvarēt gadskārtējā brīvās cīņas čempionātā. Šo cīņu galvenā favorīte ir Džonsa draudzene – cīnītāja Klēra Stronsone ar iesauku “Bifeļmāte”. Vai Rebekai izdosies glābt savu ģimeni?

programme.title: Pārkāpt robežu 3
programme.desc: Volters Vaits ir ķīmijas skolotājs. Viņam jau ir dēls invalīds un sieva gaida vēl vienu bērnu. Skolotāja alga ir maza, tādēļ Volters piestrādā automazgātavā, kur skolnieki labprāt izmanto iespēju gan par viņu, gan slimo dēlu paņirgāties. Voltera svainis savukārt strādā Narkotiku apkarošanas nodaļā un reiz Volteram piedāvā iespēju piedalīties operācijā kādā metamfetamīna laboratorijā. Operācijas laikā Volts redz, kā viens dīleris aizbēg, un tas izrādās viņa bijušais skolnieks. Volts nolemj sākt nodarboties ar narkotiku ražošanu, jo zaudēt vairs nav ko – dakteris ir paziņojis, ka viņam ir plaušu vēzis. Volts kopā ar jauno pārinieku noīrē treileri, kuru pārtaisa par laboratoriju un nogādā tuksneša vidū. Var jau būt, ka šis bizness ir ienesīgs, bet tas prasa stiprus nervus...

programme.title: Radot izcilāko
programme.desc: Kā top paši iespaidīgākie mūsdienu inženierijas brīnumi? Ātrākais pasažieru vilciens Eiropā, viens no lielākajiem kruīza kuģiem pasaulē, izturīgākais tilts Ziemeļamerikā, lidmašīna, ko apmēros nepārspēj teju neviena cita – atklāj, kādi noslēpumi un unikālas inovācijas slēpjas aiz šo iespaidīgo konstrukciju korpusa. Arvien lielāki, ātrāki, izturīgāki inženiertehniskie sasniegumi – kā tie ietekmē mūsu dzīves, mūsu ieradumus, mūsu ceļošanas paradumus?

programme.title: Mini pa trim 2
programme.desc: Attapības spēle ģimenei un draugiem, kuru vada aktieris Mārtiņš Počs. Spēle norisināsies “Draudzīgajā kafejnīcā”, kur vairākās kārtās tiek meklētas pareizās atbildes uz dažādiem jautājumiem. Spēle norisinās, sacenšoties trim komandām, kurās apvienojušās sabiedrībā pazīstamas personas ar ģimeni vai draugiem!

programme.title: Gāzi grīdā! Top 41. TOP GEARS TOP 41 16:9 HD: Ep 106
programme.desc: Raidījuma Gāzi grīdā cienītājiem – astoņos raidījumos apkopotas pēdējās desmitgades spilgtākās, interesantākās un neaizmirstamākās epizodes. Džeremijs iepazīs pasaulē mazāko auto Peel 50, kopā ar Ričardu un Džeimsu viegli slīdēs ar veco Ford Fiesta autiņu pa iepirkšanās centru, cenšoties manevrēt starp produktu plauktiem, iepazīstinās ar prestižo auto Lotus Exige, dosies braucienā cauri Rumānijai un mēģinās uzbraukt aktīvā vulkānā.

programme.title: Krietnie zagļi 2
programme.desc: Kādreiz Neitans Fords bija apdrošināšanas firmas izmeklētājs. Tagad viņš saaicinājis komandā vislabākos bijušos noziedzniekus. Viņi palīdz tiem cilvēkiem, kuri nevēlas vai nespēj atrisināt savas problēmas ar likumīgām metodēm un policijas palīdzību. Parasti tas nozīmē, ka viņiem ir jāapkrāpj blēži, kas iedzīvojušies uz sveša īpašuma rēķina un bieži vien pat skaitās sabiedrībā cienījami ļaudis. Neita komandā ietilpst datorģēnijs un hakeris Aleks Hārdisons, zagle un trakulīga dāma Pārkere, aktrise un krāpniece Sofija un plaša profila speciālists Eliots. Šie ļaudis ir retums, īstas pērles – zagļu komanda, par kuru godīgie tur īkšķi, lai viņiem izdodas!

Neita komandā ietilpst datorģēnijs un hakeris Aleks Hārdisons, zagle un trakulīga dāma Pārkere, aktrise un krāpniece Sofija un plaša profila speciālists Eliots. Šie ļaudis ir retums, īstas pērles – zagļu komanda, par kuru godīgie tur īkšķi, lai viņiem izdodas!

programme.title: Krietnie zagļi 2
programme.desc: Kādreiz Neitans Fords bija apdrošināšanas firmas izmeklētājs. Tagad viņš saaicinājis komandā vislabākos bijušos noziedzniekus. Viņi palīdz tiem cilvēkiem, kuri nevēlas vai nespēj atrisināt savas problēmas ar likumīgām metodēm un policijas palīdzību. Parasti tas nozīmē, ka viņiem ir jāapkrāpj blēži, kas iedzīvojušies uz sveša īpašuma rēķina un bieži vien pat skaitās sabiedrībā cienījami ļaudis. Šie ļaudis ir retums, īstas pērles – zagļu komanda, par kuru godīgie tur īkšķi, lai viņiem izdodas!

programme.title: Antikvariāts uz riteņiem
programme.desc: Antīko lietu pārzinātāja Kristīna Trevainjona un amatnieks Vils Kērks apceļo Lielbritānijas mājsaimniecības, noslauka putekļus no tur atrastām, nenovērtētām pērlēm un atklāj to stāstus. Daudz nevilcinoties, šie dārgumu mednieki ķeras pie relikviju rūpīgas atjaunošanas un, kad lietas atguvušas agrāko spozmi, ļauj tām nonākt pareizajās rokās, dodot jaunu dzīvi.

programme.title: Antikvariāts uz riteņiem
programme.desc: Antīko lietu pārzinātāja Kristīna Trevainjona un amatnieks Vils Kērks apceļo Lielbritānijas mājsaimniecības, noslauka putekļus no tur atrastām, nenovērtētām pērlēm un atklāj to stāstus. programme.title: No zēna par vīru
programme.desc: Ceļotājs Tims Nonans dodas episkā piedzīvojumā uz pasaules skarbākajām vietām, lai savām acīm ieraudzītu dažus no pasaules sīkstākajiem vīriem. Dokumentālajās sērijās atklājas piedzīvojumu meklētāja divus gadus ilgais ceļojums uz nomaļiem pasaules nostūriem Brazīlijā, Kamerūnā, Kirgizstānā, Madagaskarā, Meksikā, Mongolijā, Jaungvinejā, Krievijā, Taizemē un Venecuēlā. Tur viņš iepazina maz pētītu cilšu kultūru, pamazām iemantoja iezemiešu uzticību un visbeidzot – piedzīvoja bīstamākos pilngadības rituālus un pārbaudījumus, kādi saglabājušies līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Pasaules spēkavīru čempionāts 2024
programme.desc: Pasaules spēkavīru sacensības pārbauda stiprinieku absolūtās robežas, metot izaicinājumu ne tikai viņu fiziskajam spēkam, bet arī veiklībai un garīgajai izturībai. Starp dalībniekiem arī Latvijas spēkavīrs Aivars Šmaukstelis, kuram pieder vairāki Ginesa rekordi.

programme.title: Nakts muzejā
programme.desc: Īstā dzīve notiek tikai naktīs – vismaz muzejos. Lerijs par to pārliecinās uz savas ādas, piesakoties par sargu vēstures muzejā, kur viņa maiņas laikā sāk notikt pārsteidzošas lietas – maiju kareivji, Romas gladiatori un kovboji dodas cīņās cits pret citu. Mēģinot iegūt uguni, neandertālietis nodedzina savu apmetni, bet T-rex uzskatāmi atgādina, kādēļ savulaik bijis bīstamākais plēsējs uz zemes.

programme.title: Basketbols: NBA 2024/25. Phoenix Suns - Dallas Mavericks
Ekspedīcija ar Stīvu Bekšelu 2
programme.desc: Drosmīgos piedzīvojumos sev līdzi aicina britu dabaszinātnieks, pētnieks, rakstnieks, pasniedzējs un televīzijas zvaigzne – Stīvs Bekšals. Dodies ekstrēmos ceļojumos un ielūkojies unikālos nostūros, kur kāju spēris vien retais.

programme.title: Ekspedīcija ar Stīvu Bekšelu 2
programme.desc: Drosmīgos piedzīvojumos sev līdzi aicina britu dabaszinātnieks, pētnieks, rakstnieks, pasniedzējs un televīzijas zvaigzne – Stīvs Bekšals. Dodies ekstrēmos ceļojumos un ielūkojies unikālos nostūros, kur kāju spēris vien retais.

programme.title: Kā rūpnīcas mainīja pasauli
programme.desc: Masveida ražošana ir nozīmīga mūsu dzīves daļa, taču tā dod iespēju ne tikai radīt un būvēt, bet arī iznīcināt un patērēt kā vēl nekad agrāk. Raidījumā tiek salīdzinātas pagātnes, tagadnes un nākotnes rūpnīcas, sākot no smagās rūpniecības un kara tehnikas izgatavošanas, līdz rūpnīcām, kas ražo pārtiku, apģērbu un citas ikdienas preces. Tāpat tiek novērtēta rūpnīcu ietekme uz apkārtējo ainavu, pilsētām un kultūru. Šī būs iespēja arī ielūkoties jaunāko tehnoloģiju sasniegumos un izzināt, kā rūpniecība varētu izskatīties nākotnē.

programme.title: Kā rūpnīcas mainīja pasauli
programme.desc: Masveida ražošana ir nozīmīga mūsu dzīves daļa, taču tā dod iespēju ne tikai radīt un būvēt, bet arī iznīcināt un patērēt kā vēl nekad agrāk. Raidījumā tiek salīdzinātas pagātnes, tagadnes un nākotnes rūpnīcas, sākot no smagās rūpniecības un kara tehnikas izgatavošanas, līdz rūpnīcām, kas ražo pārtiku, apģērbu un citas ikdienas preces. Tāpat tiek novērtēta rūpnīcu ietekme uz apkārtējo ainavu, pilsētām un kultūru. Šī būs iespēja arī ielūkoties jaunāko tehnoloģiju sasniegumos un izzināt, kā rūpniecība varētu izskatīties nākotnē.

programme.title: Female Spies of WWII
programme.sub-title: We explore the hidden stories of the female spies at work across Japan, China and India including Chinese princess Yoshiko Kawashima, Elizabeth Betty McIntosh, and Elizabeth Choy.
programme.desc: This series tells the stories of talented female spies that overcame inherent sexism to put their lives on the line for their countries; their espionage efforts helped turn the tides of World War II.

programme.title: From the Ashes of WWII
programme.sub-title: An exploration of Britains remarkable journey from devastation to recovery, this episode showcases Britains transformation from rubble to a strong social democracy.
programme.desc: This is the story of how the cities that were attacked, damaged and destroyed during the Second World War rose again and were rebuilt for a new world.

programme.title: Bomber: Terror of WWII
programme.sub-title: Tactics on both sides evolved in both attack and defence: the bomber and the defence against it became more effective through improvements to bomb sites, navigation, development of radar and more.
programme.desc: There have been a catalogue of inventions in the history of warfare that have changed the way battles are fought, but one weapon changed not only the battlefield, but war itself: the bomber.

programme.title: Tombs of Egypt: Imhotep, The Pyramid Creator
programme.sub-title: Archaeologist Zahi Hawass hopes to discover the tomb of Imhotep, the architect of the Step Pyramid of Djoser, and aims to unearth the many secrets of the Egyptian mummies with his team.
programme.desc: Archaeologist Zahi Hawass and his team embark on a thrilling quest to find the tomb of Imhotep, the greatest scholar of ancient times and architect of the Step Pyramid of Djoser.

programme.title: The Enigma of the Swamp Mummy
programme.desc: The Tollund Man is a natural mummy offering a rare face-to-face encounter with the past; who was he, how did he live, and what was he doing here in the peat with a rope around his neck?

programme.title: Lost Treasure Tombs of the Ancient Maya
programme.sub-title: We visit Copán in Honduras and Palenque in Mexico to follow archaeologists as they discover how the Maya lived; in Tikal in Guatemala, experts explore the scale of Maya kingdoms.
programme.desc: We follow archaeologists as they search for clues to how the Maya lived; with exclusive access to excavations, this is an amazing opportunity to learn what happened to this fascinating civilisation.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: The Habsburgs were the most powerful family in Europe for centuries; why was their destiny so fatal, and were all their tribulations connected to some kind of curse?
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: The Lost Japanese Treasure is thought to have been buried under the Philippines by retreating Japanese forces at the end of WWII; it is said to include relics, artwork, and gold melted down into bars.
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: The Titanic in Colour
programme.sub-title: The first episode takes us from the Titanics construction in Belfast to the final photograph of the ship as she sails into the North Atlantic.
programme.desc: The Titanics story is often told in black and white; now the ship is revealed in its true colours with photographs and film footage that have been specially colourised for this series.

programme.title: The Titanic in Colour
programme.sub-title: Artefacts at an auction of Titanic memorabilia in the south of England prove that fascination with the Titanic shows no sign of waning over a century after the sinking of the ship.
programme.desc: The Titanics story is often told in black and white; now the ship is revealed in its true colours with photographs and film footage that have been specially colourised for this series.

programme.title: Secret Weapons: WWII
programme.sub-title: The struggle for victory necessitated development of gun technologies; new inventions would emerge on the battlefields and at times surprise soldiers on both sides of the fight.
programme.desc: This series highlights how WWII fuelled technological leaps leading to jet planes and space rockets; each episode delves into different weapon categories and offers insights into wartime engineering.

programme.title: Secret Weapons: WWII
programme.sub-title: World War II fostered the emergence of both iconic and unusual tanks that were each engineered with distinct aims; we explore diverse tank innovations and the overall trajectory of armoured warfare.
programme.desc: This series highlights how WWII fuelled technological leaps leading to jet planes and space rockets; each episode delves into different weapon categories and offers insights into wartime engineering.

programme.title: Secret Weapons: WWII
programme.sub-title: World War II ignited a fierce battle for aerial dominance and drove nations to pioneer secret aircraft technologies; this episode explores the development of early jet fighters.
programme.desc: This series highlights how WWII fuelled technological leaps leading to jet planes and space rockets; each episode delves into different weapon categories and offers insights into wartime engineering.

programme.title: Secret Weapons: WWII
programme.sub-title: World War II was a battle for supremacy at sea more than any other conflict before or since; in this episode, we explore how the secret weapons of naval warfare changed the tides of history.
programme.desc: This series highlights how WWII fuelled technological leaps leading to jet planes and space rockets; each episode delves into different weapon categories and offers insights into wartime engineering.

programme.title: Secret Weapons: WWII
programme.sub-title: WWII facilitated the use of technology to wreak destruction from afar; through success and failure, the bomb was and remains a weapon that can tip the balance in favour of those who wield its power.
programme.desc: This series highlights how WWII fuelled technological leaps leading to jet planes and space rockets; each episode delves into different weapon categories and offers insights into wartime engineering.

programme.title: World War II - Battles for Europe
programme.sub-title: June 1944 - American, British and Canadian troops stormed the Normandy beaches along a 50-mile stretch. We look at the amphibious tanks and the heavy kit that weighed them down as they waded ashore.
programme.desc: From the beaches of Normandy to the heartland of the Third Reich, this programme delivers compelling and definitive stories of the battles fought to liberate Western Europe from the Nazis.

programme.title: World War II - Battles for Europe
programme.sub-title: June 1944: the British and Canadians are still short of the objective they planned to capture on D-Day: the city of Caen. This episode tells the story of the bloody fighting for the city.
programme.desc: From the beaches of Normandy to the heartland of the Third Reich, this programme delivers compelling and definitive stories of the battles fought to liberate Western Europe from the Nazis.

programme.title: World War II - Battles for Europe
programme.sub-title: July 1944: American forces plan a major offensive named Operation Cobra. They would attack near St Lo, achieve a breakthrough, then unleash General Patton and the US Third Army to exploit the opening.
programme.desc: From the beaches of Normandy to the heartland of the Third Reich, this programme delivers compelling and definitive stories of the battles fought to liberate Western Europe from the Nazis.

programme.title: World War II - Battles for Europe
programme.sub-title: September 1944: Montgomery proposes a bold plan to cross the Rhine and encircle Germanys industrial heartland. If successful, his plan could end the war by Christmas.
programme.desc: From the beaches of Normandy to the heartland of the Third Reich, this programme delivers compelling and definitive stories of the battles fought to liberate Western Europe from the Nazis.

programme.title: World War II - Battles for Europe
programme.sub-title: October 1944: the Allies face a major supply crisis - vital fuel and ammunition still has to be landed at the D-Day beaches. When the port of Antwerp is liberated, it seems the crisis might be over.
programme.desc: From the beaches of Normandy to the heartland of the Third Reich, this programme delivers compelling and definitive stories of the battles fought to liberate Western Europe from the Nazis.

programme.title: Viking Women: The Untold Story
programme.desc: What rank did Viking women occupy in a hierarchical world reputedly dominated by men? We reveal a complex society and offer a nuanced and precise portrait of the women of the frozen lands.

programme.title: Auschwitz: The Inside Man
programme.desc: As a witness to some of the darkest chapters of human history, Polish officer Witold Pilecki was the first man to inform the Allies about the reality of the Holocaust from inside Auschwitz.

programme.desc: This series tells the stories of talented female spies that overcame inherent sexism to put their lives on the line for their countries; their espionage efforts helped turn the tides of World War II.

programme.title: JFK: 24 Hours That Changed The World
programme.desc: To mark the 60th anniversary of the assassination of John F. Kennedy, this documentary brings together archival footage from across the world rarely seen by the general public.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: No other family in 20th-century America has held higher status than the Kennedys, but as blessed as they seemingly were, they were also cursed by a series of tragic and bizarre events.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: The Grimaldi family has held their posts as sovereigns of Monaco with the utmost grace, but one thing they have missed time and again is good luck in the love department.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Treasures with Bettany Hughes
programme.sub-title: Bulgaria is a treasure trove of history and culture; join Bettany as she embarks on an adventure meeting local people, sampling their cuisine, and learning about their cherished customs along the way.
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes travels across the world to investigate the story of humanity; making new discoveries along the way, she lifts the lid on the most remarkable treasures of civilisation.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: On a hill near Mt. Ararat in Turkey is what most scientists believe is just an unusually shaped rock formation; hoping to prove its the remains of Noahs Ark, a research team investigates the site.
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Lost Treasure Tombs of the Ancient Maya
programme.sub-title: We investigate grim evidence of human sacrifice at Copán in Honduras, and experts brave an erupting volcano in Guatemala to search for clues explaining why the Maya abandoned their cities.
programme.desc: We follow archaeologists as they search for clues to how the Maya lived; with exclusive access to excavations, this is an amazing opportunity to learn what happened to this fascinating civilisation.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: Archaeologists discovery of King Tuts tomb taught us about a lost civilisation. When death befell several members of the team, rumours of a curse on the tomb spread like wildfire around the world.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Queens That Changed The World
programme.sub-title: Anne was one of the hardest-working monarchs the country had ever seen; she brought about the union of England and Scotland, making her the first Queen of Great Britain.
programme.desc: For so long believed to be side characters in histories dominated by men, some queens wielded extraordinary power; we discover how six women ruled in ways that far surpassed their male counterparts.

programme.title: Viking Women: The Untold Story
programme.desc: What rank did Viking women occupy in a hierarchical world reputedly dominated by men? We reveal a complex society and offer a nuanced and precise portrait of the women of the frozen lands.

programme.title: Auschwitz - One Day
programme.desc: This documentary tells the story of a typical day in 1944 at the concentration camp of Auschwitz; it is based on a unique document which is kept in the Israeli memorial site of Yad Vashem.

programme.title: From the Ashes of WWII
programme.sub-title: An exploration of Britains remarkable journey from devastation to recovery, this episode showcases Britains transformation from rubble to a strong social democracy.
programme.desc: This is the story of how the cities that were attacked, damaged and destroyed during the Second World War rose again and were rebuilt for a new world.

programme.title: Secret Lives of the Roman Emperors with Mary Beard
programme.desc: Acclaimed classicist Mary Beard explores what it was really like to be emperor of Rome, taking us behind palace walls to reveal the hidden world of the Roman imperial court and lifestyle.

programme.title: Real Life of a Roman Soldier
programme.sub-title: Two sites are emblematic of legionary life in Ancient Roman times: the fort of Vindolanda and the garrison of Lugdunum. Excavations have unearthed objects that shed light on the life of these sites.
programme.desc: Recent excavations in England and France have shed new light on the real day-to-day lives of Roman soldiers, uncovering the truth of the living men behind the legendary figures.

programme.title: Real Life of a Roman Soldier
programme.sub-title: Recent excavations in the city of Lyon shed light on the daily lives of Roman soldiers; numerous artefacts have been unearthed such as 1st-century A.D. / C.E. weapons and toiletry and leisure items.
programme.desc: Recent excavations in England and France have shed new light on the real day-to-day lives of Roman soldiers, uncovering the truth of the living men behind the legendary figures.

programme.title: Pompeii: Buried Secrets of the Villa Giuliana
programme.desc: February 2021: a nearly intact Roman ceremonial chariot is unearthed to the north of the site of Pompeii. How could it have been used, and what would traffic have looked like in Pompeiis streets?

programme.title: Rise and Fall: The Turning Points of World War II
programme.sub-title: In the aftermath of the Great War, the victors sign the Treaty of Versailles. We begin this series by exploring the 20 years after World War One and the events that led to the birth of World War Two.
programme.desc: Through military campaigns, great battles, retreats, defeats and victories, we examine what decided the affair on and above the battlefields of Europe, Asia and North Africa and in the worlds oceans.

programme.title: Rise and Fall: The Turning Points of World War II
programme.sub-title: In this episode, we explore the first few years on the European battlefield, from the invasion of France and the subsequent Dunkirk evacuation to Hitlers betrayal of his pact with Stalin.
programme.desc: Through military campaigns, great battles, retreats, defeats and victories, we examine what decided the affair on and above the battlefields of Europe, Asia and North Africa and in the worlds oceans.

programme.title: Rise and Fall: The Turning Points of World War II
programme.sub-title: We examine key movements in the Pacific Theatre - the Fall of Singapore, the Battle of Midway and the Kokoda Campaign - Rommels offensives in Africa, and the Allied bombing campaign over Europe.
programme.desc: Through military campaigns, great battles, retreats, defeats and victories, we examine what decided the affair on and above the battlefields of Europe, Asia and North Africa and in the worlds oceans.

programme.title: Rise and Fall: The Turning Points of World War II
programme.sub-title: The Axis forces begin to lose hold on their previous triumphs; between Japans loosening hold on southeast Asia and Germanys growing defeats in Europe, we begin to see WW2s turning of the tide.
programme.desc: Through military campaigns, great battles, retreats, defeats and victories, we examine what decided the affair on and above the battlefields of Europe, Asia and North Africa and in the worlds oceans.

programme.title: Rise and Fall: The Turning Points of World War II

programme.desc: Through military campaigns, great battles, retreats, defeats and victories, we examine what decided the affair on and above the battlefields of Europe, Asia and North Africa and in the worlds oceans.

programme.title: Tsunami: The Day The Wave Hit
programme.sub-title: Charlie is on the beach in Khao Lak with his dad Simon when the tsunami crashes into the hotel they are staying in; trapped in swirling water, Simon somehow saves Charlie from certain drowning.
programme.desc: We tell the story of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami through dramatic, and often heroic, individual stories with powerful - and sometimes unseen - archival footage while detailing the science behind it.

programme.title: Tsunami: The Day The Wave Hit
programme.sub-title: 15 minutes after the tsunami hit Thailand, it crashes into the east coast of Sri Lanka; despite being 1100 miles from the epicentre, the waves are travelling at the speed of a passenger jet.
programme.desc: We tell the story of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami through dramatic, and often heroic, individual stories with powerful - and sometimes unseen - archival footage while detailing the science behind it.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.sub-title: The Spanish island of Villa Winter was suspected of being a port for German U-boats and part of a larger plan to invade the United States.
programme.desc: The collapse of the Third Reich left as many secrets as it did relics; remnants of the Nazis schemes still lie concealed in structures scattered across the globe today.

programme.title: Rise and Fall: The Turning Points of World War II
programme.sub-title: We witness the final moments and aftermath of World War II with the establishment of war crime trials - such as the ones in Nuremberg - and move towards peace with the creation of the United Nations.
programme.desc: Through military campaigns, great battles, retreats, defeats and victories, we examine what decided the affair on and above the battlefields of Europe, Asia and North Africa and in the worlds oceans.

programme.desc: From the beaches of Normandy to the heartland of the Third Reich, this programme delivers compelling and definitive stories of the battles fought to liberate Western Europe from the Nazis.

programme.desc: There have been a catalogue of inventions in the history of warfare that have changed the way battles are fought, but one weapon changed not only the battlefield, but war itself: the bomber.

programme.title: K-Pax

programme.title: Meeste sudameid võites

programme.title: Valerian ja tuhande planeedi linn

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.sub-title: A leg infection hampers a young duikers release, Dr Amanda tracks and collars a young lion, and we check on an ailing bush baby and greet a new addition to the centre, a grumpy grey parrot.
programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: Outback Vet
programme.sub-title: Cyclone Damien, the biggest cyclone to hit Karratha for ten years, heads towards the Vet Hospital; meanwhile, a lady prepares to cross Australia by camel in the Pilbara desert.
programme.desc: Meet Rick Fenny, a 40-year career veterinarian; he regularly embarks on a round trip across Western Australia to visit remote clients, working with animals in some of the most hostile conditions.

programme.title: Wild LatAm
programme.sub-title: The highs and lows of the Andes create habitats that vary greatly, from bears and snakes low on the ground to condors, vicuñas, hummingbirds and quetzals up high in the hills and treetops.
programme.desc: A vibrant portrait of the biodiverse habitats in South America; inhabitants range from large to small, from colourful to perfectly camouflaged, and from the lone hunter to thousand-strong hordes.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian heads to the historic Harewood House near Leeds to check on some goats who are moving to a new enclosure, and Peter heads over to help when a young farmer struggles with a tricky lambing.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.sub-title: A honeymoon bride is dragged to her death in the Colombian Amazon; when a retired nurse gives crucial new evidence, Jeremy has to prove a far-fetched theory about the brides last moments.
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade is on the hunt for freshwater fish with a taste for human flesh. Using forensic methods, Jeremy illustrates to the viewer how these river monsters are constructed to kill.

programme.title: Surviving the Asteroid
programme.desc: 66 million years ago: a gigantic asteroid hits the Earth and wipes out the reign of the dinosaurs as no animal weighing more than 500 grams survives this catastrophe. Who are the survivors?

programme.title: Lost Beasts: Unearthed
programme.sub-title: Titanosaurs are the largest animals ever to walk the Earth; palaeontologists explore their gigantic fossils to discover why they grew so big.
programme.desc: From deadly T. rexes to giant woolly mammoths, new evidence reveals how giant beasts evolved to conquer the planet, how they grew so big, and what triggered their extinction.

programme.title: Lost Beasts: Unearthed
programme.sub-title: A team in South America uncover the bones of a rare armoured dinosaur; could it be a missing link in the evolution of the ankylosaurs?
programme.desc: From deadly T. rexes to giant woolly mammoths, new evidence reveals how giant beasts evolved to conquer the planet, how they grew so big, and what triggered their extinction.

programme.title: Giants
programme.sub-title: Dan ONeill is on a mission to find, film and measure the planets biggest predatory sharks; he heads to the Neptune Islands, a place that is perfect for spotting giant great whites.
programme.desc: Explorer, biologist and conservationist Dan ONeill is on the trail of the largest living animals in the world; what does it take to become and survive as a giant past or present?

programme.title: Predator Countdown
programme.sub-title: We journey to the vast continent of North America to witness the enduring struggle between wolves and musk oxen and how bottlenose dolphins hunt for fish.
programme.desc: We journey across Africa, Australia, North America and South America to witness the raw power and tenacity of natures most remarkable predators.

programme.title: Raptors
programme.sub-title: An insightful and spectacular celebration of birds of prey, our planets most successful hunters; from frozen wilderness to tangled jungle, this episode reveals the raptors as never before.
programme.desc: Birds of prey are our planets greatest hunters; united by a hooked beak, a taste for flesh and razor-sharp talons, they have conquered the globe. This is the story of raptors unparalleled success...

programme.title: Raptors

programme.title: Planet Shark
programme.sub-title: Older than the dinosaurs, sharks have roamed our oceans for over 400 million years; only today are scientists are beginning to unlock the secrets to their success.
programme.desc: Sharks are one of the oldest and successful hunters ever to have lived; they dominate every corner of our oceans, but what is it about these extraordinary survivors that makes them so successful?

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Theres a shock in the borderlands where the Stork Colony pack roams, Vultures, elephants, baboons, and hyenas make for noisy neighbours for the Manzi pack, and the Kakuli pack goes missing.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Julz discovers lions in Manzi territory and is relieved when he finds the dogs safe, a brave puku antelope foils a Kakuli pack hunt, and the Stork pack recovers after losing a pup.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: A future dispersal of young adult dogs in the Manzi pack looks inevitable, the dry season forces the Kakuli pack to take risks, and ecologist Henry identifies a new dog who has joined the Stork pack.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Its Julzs last week; an encounter with lions scatters the Stork pack, Julz spots the Kakuli puppies feeding on a puku carcass, and the Manzi pack fight a warthog by the Luangwa River.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi, the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs, and yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack and join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Program on a house call to the Kakumbi den where another pup has gone missing.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack and a Manzi faction thats ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups as they face off with a warthog, and Thandie Mweetwa - ZCPs lion specialist - counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Animals Decoded
programme.sub-title: The knowledge passed down in some species can evolve in response to changes in their natural environment; could the flexibility of their cultures be the key to their survival in changing environments?
programme.desc: There is a whole world of animal languages waiting to be decoded; this series shares the latest science and fascinating footage of animals in the wild to reveal the secrets of animal communication.

programme.title: Brotherhood of Lions
programme.sub-title: This episode introduces lions with distinct personalities and follows them as they hunt and explore new territories, but conflict arises when the mothers return with new cubs.
programme.desc: This series tells the compelling and immersive story of the daily life of young lions and their challenges while growing up; it also showcases the struggles and triumphs of the lions.

programme.title: Brotherhood of Lions
programme.sub-title: Hunger drives the cubs to violence and family relationships are complicated; the lions rely on the more agile lionesses for hunting and face challenges such as climate change.
programme.desc: This series tells the compelling and immersive story of the daily life of young lions and their challenges while growing up; it also showcases the struggles and triumphs of the lions.

programme.title: Brotherhood of Lions

programme.title: Wonders of Mexico
programme.sub-title: Mexico is a vast country; over 2,000 miles long, its dominated by a great chain of mountains known as the Sierra Madre. Journey down this rocky spine and youll discover an amazing diversity of life.
programme.desc: This documentary series reveals Mexicos astonishing wildlife, landscape and culture as we pay a visit to the ancient temples of the Maya, the Sierra Madre, and the Sonoran and Chihuahuan deserts.

programme.title: Patagonia: Earths Secret Paradise
programme.sub-title: Discover the secret lives of pumas and hummingbirds, soar with condors over glacial peaks, and join extreme kayakers and Patagonias cowboys - the gauchos - as they round up wild horses.
programme.desc: This three-part series discovers the surprising stories of the unusual wildlife and the people that survive in epic Patagonian landscapes of volcanoes, glaciers, desert and treacherous oceans.

programme.title: Epic Animal Migrations: Patagonia
programme.desc: Each year sees thousands return to Patagonia to raise their young, many more come home to feed, and some to hunt - this is the story of their epic migrations.

programme.title: Hidden India
programme.sub-title: India is a land of seasonal extremes; monsoon rains flood the land, and heat and drought builds once they are gone. Its a challenge for the animals, but it also fosters amazing landscapes.
programme.desc: We celebrate the diversity and flavours of the Indian subcontinent, travelling from the roof of the world in the north to the great rivers and deserts at its heart and the rainforests of the south.

programme.title: Hidden India
programme.sub-title: We explore the little-known Western Ghats and the mighty Himalayas; the Himalayas are so vast that they drive the climate by capturing monsoon winds to protect India from the northern chill.
programme.desc: We celebrate the diversity and flavours of the Indian subcontinent, travelling from the roof of the world in the north to the great rivers and deserts at its heart and the rainforests of the south.

programme.title: Hidden India
programme.sub-title: The Ganges flows through the heart of the nation, from deep in the Himalayas to the widespread delta mangrove forests; she carries valuable nutrients and irrigates the fertile soil of Asia.
programme.desc: We celebrate the diversity and flavours of the Indian subcontinent, travelling from the roof of the world in the north to the great rivers and deserts at its heart and the rainforests of the south.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests
programme.sub-title: We watch the seasons wax and wane; witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prepare for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.
programme.desc: Traverse the planets richest and most diverse woodlands - from the tropics to the poles and everywhere in between - and learn how forests connect and nurture the lives of countless species.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.sub-title: Dr Amanda removes a sable antelopes collar, and the team helps a baby vervet monkey find a new mum; two orphaned serval cats are also freed, and we follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.
programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: Outback Vet
programme.sub-title: Ed and Dunc set out on a shark mission in Shark Bay to restock Ocean Park after having closed for Covid, and Rick weighs a Rottweiler using his local pubs forklift.
programme.desc: Meet Rick Fenny, a 40-year career veterinarian; he regularly embarks on a round trip across Western Australia to visit remote clients, working with animals in some of the most hostile conditions.

programme.title: Wild LatAm
programme.sub-title: Patagonia, in the extreme south of the South American continent, is one of the most varied and diverse territories on Earth; we visit penguins, elephant seals, sea lions and orcas.
programme.desc: A vibrant portrait of the biodiverse habitats in South America; inhabitants range from large to small, from colourful to perfectly camouflaged, and from the lone hunter to thousand-strong hordes.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peters under extra pressure with Charlie the horse - he belongs to his niece Jess; when Julian sees Jackie Barlow, its usually about one of her alpacas, but today the patient is her little dog Isla.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian is called to an emergency on Tom Stockils farm and Peter removes an ominous looking lump for boxer dog Boot; this brings back bittersweet memories for Peter of his own beloved boxer Alf.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups as they face off with a warthog, and Thandie Mweetwa - ZCPs lion specialist - counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.
